contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.EmailPreviewText: Check out the latest news 📰 from the Kentico community!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.EmailSubject: July Xperience by Kentico Refresh and other announcements 📢
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailIntroContent:
Hey {!ResolveDynamicText("Recipient.FirstName","friend")!} ,

For this week's Kentico Community Newsletter we have news about a new Kentico user group, updates to the Kentico Community Portal, this month's Refresh, and tools to help you migrate to Xperience by Kentico. We also have a few great content contributions from the Kentico community. Enjoy!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailOutroContent:
If you found the information in this newsletter helpful or if something looks strange in your email client, let us know by giving us some feedback.

Watch your inbox for the next Kentico Community Newsletter!
